attraction_reviewComments: This wealthy community legacy brings in some leading edge art and has a solid collection that is well displayed. Succulent and tropical gardens are wonderful as well. Great... read more

Even if you are not a fan of contemporary art, the cafe, outdoor garden, museum and spectacular views from an architecturally beautiful building is absolutely worth a visit.

Perfect place to unwind after visiting the museum or the area. Nice selections and good quality

The exhibits were fun and interesting. Definitely worth a visit! Go to the top floor, it has a suprise exhibit.
The most spectacular work of art in the museum, year in and year out, is the wall of glass that allows visitors to view the ocean from a perfect lookout point.

Small but very nice art museum. Enjoyed the exhibits and the permanent collection. The sculpture gardens aren the grounds are worth checking out as well. Worth a visit.
Have wanted to visit this museum dozens of times and finally had the opportunity to do so on a recent visit. Enjoyed the exhibits and the quiet atmosphere.
They have some nice Warhols. Otherwise the artists are not known to me. The outside garden on the ocean side is worth seeing and it is free.
